4. Number 3: Chris Vaughan

Number 3: Chris Vaughan
=======================

Chris Vaughan was elected to City Council Position Number 3 on May 3, 2025, to serve a three-year term.

![Chris_Vaughan_2022](https://www.cityofwebster.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=11398)

Chris Vaughan
-------------

281.332.1826

Webster City Hall  
101 Pennsylvania  
Webster, TX 77598

[Email Chris Vaughan](mailto:cvaughan@cityofwebster.com)

Term Expires: May 2028
